text.jpText:
『秋華賞』当日。ファインモーションは
圧倒的な人気で注目を集める。だが観客の
期待を前に彼女はどこかへ駆けだしてしまう。
text.enText:
It is the day of the Shuka-sho. Fine Motion 
is the overwhelming favorite and attracts a 
lot of attention. However, in the face of the 
audience's expectations, she runs away.

text.jpText:
彼女は、自らが楽しく走ることで
みなが期待する高貴さを崩してしまうのでは
と、気にしていたのだ。
text.enText:
She was concerned that by running happily, 
she might destroy the nobility that everyone 
expected of her. She was concerned that by 
running happily, she might destroy the 
nobility that everyone expected of her.

text.jpText:
トレーナーは、むしろ楽しく走る姿を期待
されてると伝える。ファインモーションは
思い切り楽しく駆けると決意するのだった。
text.enText:
The trainer informs them that they are 
expected to run in a rather fun way. Fine 
motion is Fine Motion is determined to run 
with all her might.
